cause.description:
Dog lovers in Bangalore are facing a major crisis, the government has ordered the killing of stray dogs in the city! so heres where we take a stand and protest against these inhuman acts of murder. STOP KILLING STRAY DOGS!
1. Stray Dog killing Must be stopped
2. Stray Dogs are not a menace
cause.mission: protest against the governments decision to kill the stray dogs in the streets of bangalore
cause.name: Stop Killing of dogs
